headline: Salesforce Deepens Defense and Wildfire AI Roles With Long-Horizon Deals
summary: Salesforce (NYSE:CRM) just secured two long-horizon deals signaling a strategic pivot beyond core CRM. The company announced a 10-year, $5.6 billion defense contract with the U.S. Army and joined a $100 million wildfire prevention venture called EMBERPOINT LLC. Both position Salesforce as infrastructure for mission-critical operations. The Defense Play: $560 Million Annual Revenue The Army ... Salesforce Deepens Defense and Wildfire AI Roles With Long-Horizon Deals

headline: Lockheed Martin Corporation (LMT) Secures Multimillion Defense Contracts Strengthening Pipeline
summary: Lockheed Martin Corporation (NYSE:LMT) is one of the defense & aerospace stocks gaining from rising geopolitical spending. On January 22, the company secured a $9.58 million contract modification for combat systems integration and testing. The contract covers littoral combat ships and unmanned surface vessels. headline: Lockheed Martin’s Emberpoint Wildfire Venture Meets Valuation And Momentum Check
summary: Lockheed Martin (NYSE:LMT) has launched EMBERPOINT, a joint venture with PG&E, Salesforce, and Wells Fargo. The partnership is focused on using advanced technologies to help combat catastrophic wildfires across the US. EMBERPOINT aims to apply military grade autonomous systems, artificial intelligence, and integrated command control tools to civil wildfire mitigation. For investors watching NYSE:LMT, EMBERPOINT represents a move beyond the core defense business into civil safety and...

headline: Salesforce Deepens Defense And Wildfire Roles With Long Horizon AI Deals
summary: Salesforce (NYSE:CRM) secured a $5.6b, 10 year contract with the U.S. Army to modernize military operations. The company also formed EMBERPOINT LLC with Lockheed Martin, PG&E, and Wells Fargo to focus on wildfire management. Both moves expand Salesforce’s role in public sector technology and critical infrastructure projects. At a share price of $228.53, Salesforce comes into these announcements with mixed recent performance, including a 3.8% return over the past week and a 14.1% decline...

headline: Lockheed Martin's newest GPS satellite reaches orbit, strengthening warfighter connectivity
summary: Every day, Lockheed Martin (NYSE: LMT) delivers capabilities that strengthen and transform our world. On Tuesday night, the company's ninth GPS III space vehicle (SV09) launched in orbit, adding a capability that enables people to connect, gives warfighters the ability to operate in harsh conditions, and demonstrates the power of American innovation.
